TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerActionListCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表智慧標籤面板中的所有項目的彙總。The class represents the aggregation of all the items in a smart tag panel. 類別包含零或多個物件。The class contains zero or more objects. 每一份清單包含零個或多個物件，代表在面板中的實際項目，以及衍生自類別。Each of these lists contains zero or more objects that represent the actual items in the panel and are derived from the class. 下表顯示兩個的技術，可提供來填入的元件，包括自訂控制項的項目面板。The following table shows the two techniques for supplying a to populate the panel with items for components, including custom controls. |技術Technique|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |提取模型Pull model|元件類別，衍生自的設計工具類別中，提供透過此集合屬性。The designer for the component class, which is derived from the class, supplies this collection through the property. 它必須顯示面板時，設計工具的基礎結構就會讀取這個屬性。The designer infrastructure reads this property when it must display the panel.| |推送模型Push model|A或是做為參數的呼叫中提供方法與元件相關聯。A or is supplied as a parameter in a call to the method of the associated with the component.| 設計工具的基礎結構來建立智慧標籤面板，其建構函式接受兩個參數類型建構一個面板。The designer infrastructure constructs a panel by creating a smart tag panel, whose constructor takes two parameters of type . 集合，這些清單，其中包含提取和推送的項目，會合併成一個面板。The collections of lists, which contain the pulled and pushed items, are merged into one panel. 因為它衍生自類別，會使用內部來儲存其集合物件。Because it derives from the class, uses an internal to store its collection of objects. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立集合物件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 如需完整範例，請參閱 < [ 如何： 附加至 Windows Form 元件的智慧標籤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a full example, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#8)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果方法會擲回的例外狀況在複製時，為目的陣列的狀態為未定義。If the method throws an exception while copying, the state of the destination array is undefined. 例如，如果或發生時，目的地陣列可能處於部分填滿的狀態。For example, if an or occurs, the destination array may be left in a partially filled state.

param.name: index

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`index`參數的值等於屬性，新的項目加入至集合結尾。If the `index` parameter is equal to the value of the property, the new element is added to the end of the collection. 就內部而言，類別會使用包含其集合物件。Internally, the class uses a to contain its collection of objects. 清單會維護連續項目，因為插入點後面的項目會向下移動以容納新的項目。Because lists maintain contiguous elements, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. 這種重新安排會在插入點後，變更項目的索引。This rearrangement changes the index of the elements after the insertion point.

exception.span: is less than 0 or greater than the count of elements in the current collection.

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than the count of elements in the current collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就內部而言，類別會使用包含其集合物件。Internally, the class uses a to contain its collection of objects. 由於清單維持連續項目，移除點後面的項目會向上移動以佔用空出的位置。Since lists maintain contiguous elements, the elements that follow the removal point move up to occupy the vacated spot. 這種重新安排移除點之後變更項目的索引。This rearrangement changes the index of the elements after the removal point.
